entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow becoming mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
